features: Hydrating Toning Mist - Our fan-favorite toner for face balances and hydrates skin with just one mist, leaving you refreshed and soft—never greasy.
Not Your Average Skin Toner - This non-drying spray toner primes and softens skin exposed to environmental aggressors. It's like an instant refresh for your face.

Healthy Skin Formula - Star ingredient CoQ-10 (Coenzyme Q10) provides nutrients and powerful antioxidant benefits while Chamomile and Cucumber refresh your skin and Aloe, Papaya seed oil and Sage work to smooth and clarify. We didn't forget you Hyaluronic Acid toner fans, we added that, too.

How To Use - Spritz a cotton pad with this skincare toner and apply to face and neck, morning and evening after cleansing. Works great as a skin refresher after exercise or travel, just toss it in your bag and go. For an extra moisturizing toner, pair with our famous Squalane oil.

Clean Skincare By Indie Lee - Our facial skin care products are formulated without 1,300+ banned ingredients, including parabens, mineral oil, sulfate-based detergents, synthetic fragrances, petroleum-based ingredients, phthalates, phenoxyethanol, formaldehyde and GMO ingredients.
body.description: Balance and refresh your skin with this hydrating toner. Alcohol-free and formulated with antioxidant powerhouse CoQ-10, Aloe Vera, and Cucumber, this non-drying skin spritzer primes and softens skin exposed to environmental aggressors.WHY IT WORKS- Chamomile and Cucumber refresh- Aloe, Papaya and Sage smooth and clarify- CoQ-10 provides nutrients and powerful antioxidant benefits- Hyaluronic Acid provides continuous moisture, binding up to 1,000 times its weight in water- Great for all skin types- Formulated without alcohol and essential oilsOUR CLEAN COMMITMENTSWe always formulate without 1,300+ Banned Ingredients, Including: Parabens, Mineral Oil, Sulfate-based Detergents, Synthetic Fragrance, Petroleum-based Ingredients, Phthalates, Phenoxyethanol, Formaldehyde and GMO Ingredients.HOW TO USESpritz a cotton pad and apply to face and neck, morning and evening after cleansing. Works great as a skin refresher after exercise or travel. Works wonders as a toner for oily skin and dry.PRECAUTIONS- For external use only.- This product contains extracts and is essential oils-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars really wonderful for dry skin in wintertime
reviews.reviewText: I love toners, but I am trying to move beyond the alcohol-laden ones you find at the drugstore, especially this winter since it is super dry here and my skin is drying out all over. I've started using this one recently and I am really liking it a lot. I think this is best for normal to dry skin, or for use during the winter. (I typically have combination/oily skin, but there is something about winter this year that is making me super dry.)Here are the ingredients (you can see them on the product page if you zoom in on one of the images, but they are hard to read there):Purified Water, Aloe Barbadensis, Coenzyme Q10, Hyaluronic Acid, Chamomile, Sage, Carica Papaya Leaf Extract, Cucumber Extract, Citrus Aurantium Flower Oil, Phenoxyethanol And Ethylhexylglycerin Both Derived From Natural Sources.This is natural and Leaping Bunny certified, if either of those are important to you. This is relatively thin and non-viscous with a slight yellow color. It does have a scent, but the scent is from the natural extracts and oils and I find it quite pleasant (it is not herbal, medicinal, or floral, not exactly, anyway, but maybe a combination of all three?).The aloe and hyaluronic acid are moisturizing and I find that chamomile and cucumber in skincare are generally quite soothing. CoQ10 *may* contribute to skin firmness. I do feel that there was some toning or astringent benefit upon use, and this doesn't have the typical toning ingredients (e.g., no witch hazel), so perhaps there is some truth to that. CoQ10 is also an antioxidant and helps fight free radical damage, so this would be good to use after sun exposure (don't go without a good SPF product, too) or over the long term for anti-aging benefits. And papaya leaf extract has some antioxidants and antimicrobial effects.Please note: This comes in a glass bottle and the top of mine did not look like the official product image. (Mine did not have a pump. Rather, you pushed down on one part of the top to raise an opening on the other side, then upend the bottle and pour. The product flows very nicely so no worries about not being able to squeeze the bottle.)Overall, I'm a fan. This is probably going to be my go-to winter toner for a long time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Essential to my Routine
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I use this toner 2x a day or when I need a little refresh. I love this brand and how they use clean ingredients.This toner leaves my skin feeling moisturized and is a great first step after cleansing. It creates a layer that locks in moisture and is great to use with hyaluronic acid.The only downside is the mister is pretty intense. I would advise not to use to set makeup because it can leave large water bubbles on your face and ruin your makeup.Highly recommend!
